name: 30 Second Oath
description:
This is an attempt at getting a game done for https://itch.io/jam/rndgame-jam-2

Its currently nowhere near complete.

Cursor keys to move,
Z  or C to jump.

X To attack.

Backstory

Dr Evil Lulzs has just killed your master you vow to get your revenge in 30 seconds. This gives you thirty seconds to reach Dr Evil Lulzs and attack or you will explode violently.

Status

Most of the game is here, you can navigate through most of the level.

I didn't have time to finish the final boss.

Hint attacking boots your speed.

I hope you find it enjoyable anyway.
